infos.value: Still standing, huh? Just what I'd expect from the great Sir Owe!
But we still have plenty of Fennes soldiers to throw at him, aye?
(Owe, you must leave me here and get to safety.)
(I-I will not!)
(What will come of continuing this fight any longer?)
(How could I face Lord Sterne were I to abandon Your Highness here!?)
(But, to Sterne you are irreplaceable...)
(Were you to fall here, it would certainly crush his spirit.)
(I wouldn't be so sure of that, Your Highness.)
(If I died here, it would surely light a valiant fire in Sterne's heart.)
(Th-that's nonsense!)
(Death does not scare me, so long as my own might prove useful. It is for that very reason that I serve.)
Ngh!
Y-Your Highness!
Listen well, soldiers. You are to depart and make way for Wezette at once.
B-but...what of you and Queen Helena!?
You all will prove invaluable in the battles to come. To die here would serve no purpose.
B-but...
Cast aside any regrets. Reconvene with King Oelde and rally «Fortem»!
And then...you must kill Muraga!
But the ancient relics...
We've no choice but to abandon them.
You can't be serious...
If you've no ears for orders, then I've no hope for your souls!
I'll strike you down myself if you disobey me! Now go!
And just what do you hope to achieve by fighting alone!?
I must apologize in advance.
Apologize...? For what?
Never have I wielded my sword in hatred...
...until now. This is the first time I've desired to hear the death cries of my enemies.
I admit...that I am no longer in control of my emotions.
Any pleas for mercy will fall on deaf ears. And for that, I apologize.
Wh-why you...
Now let us begin...this dance of blades and blood.
